titles.title: Law Enforcement Officers Protection Act of 1985, Amendment
A bill to amend the Law Enforcement Officers Protection Act of 1985.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15785-15786)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/16/1993--Introduced. Law Enforcement Officers Protection Act of 1985, Amendment - Amends the Federal criminal code to revise the definition of "armor piercing ammunition" to include a jacketed projectile which may be used in a handgun, whose jacket has a weight of more than 25 percent of the total weight of the projectile.
